page.title: 05CAPEL SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: CAPEL SERVES 24O PUPILS FROM 5_11 YEARS IN 7 CLASSES.MR.STINTON ,HEAD FOR 28 YEARS,HAS 7 TEACHING STAFF,A PART TIME SECRETARY,A COOK AND KITCHEN STAFF,4 MIDDAY MEALS SUPERVISORS,A CARETAKER,A CLEANER AND A LOLLIPOP LADY OR CROSSING PATROL.THERE IS A LARGE PLAYING FIELD ,A COMBINED DINING AND VISUAL AIDS ROOM,AN ASSEMBLY HALL WITH STAGE BLOCKS AND GYMNASTICS APPARATUS AND WELL EQUIPPED CLASS ROOMS.A REFERENCE LIBRARY,NATURE POND, DRAMA STORE AND RESOURCE AREA ARE RECENT AMENITIES.MUSIC PLAYS AN IMPORTANT PART IN THE LIFE OF THE SCHOOL.RECORDERS,CHOIR,COUNTRY DANCING, GYMNASTICS AND SWIMMING ARE KEENLY ATTENDED AFTER SCHOOL CLUBS. CAPEL PARTICIPATES FULLY IN TONBRIDGE INTER_SCHOOL ACTIVITIES.LEAVERS HAVE A WIDE CHOICE OF SECONDARY SCHOOLS IN PADDOCK WOOD,TONBRIDGE & T.WELLS.
